statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); git_branch=$(cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false config --global core.useBuiltinFSMonitor false 2>/dev/null; git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then git_status=$(cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_status" ]; then git_info=" $(printf '\033[1;34m')git:$(printf '\033[31m')$git_branch$(printf '\033[34m')$(printf '\033[0m') $(printf '\033[33m')✗$(printf '\033[0m')"; else git_info=" $(printf '\033[1;34m')git:$(printf '\033[31m')$git_branch$(printf '\033[34m')$(printf '\033[0m')"; fi; else git_info=""; fi; printf '\033[1;32m➜\033[0m  \033[36m%s\033[0m%s' "$(basename "$dir")" "$git_info"
